title: Sample Efficient Reinforcement Learning
description: We’re researching bounds on sample efficiency in simple, delayed reward settings, both minimax lower bounds for all methods and concrete upper bounds for popular methods. With these bounds in hand, we can understand the weaknesses in current methods and hopefully find new methods that get close to lower bounds.
